func.title: SetPlayerViewLock

param.name: player
param.desc: Player whose view lock is to be turned on or off. NO_OWNER for all players.

param.name: locked
param.desc: If the view is to be locked (true) or unlocked (false).

func.desc: Disabled or enabled locked view for one or all players. If the view is locked, the player cannot scroll around to explore the map.
func.remark: In 9.0 OC this function was deprecated, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer and SetViewLocked().

example.text: Code for a scenario script: Players can see exactly 1000 pixels wide around their Clonk and cannot scroll further.
